committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to clear title to certain lands along the California-Nevada boundary.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Confirms title in specified lands in California and Nevada which were transferred to such States by the Federal Government, conveyed by such States to third parties, and were determined in a border dispute resolution to be a part of a State other than the State which conveyed the title. Sets forth procedures for determining which lands are affected.

titles.title: A bill to clear title to certain lands along the California-Nevada boundary.
